General.Name: Dur Hospitality
General.Description: Dur Hospitality Company develops, manages, and operates hotels and residential compounds in the Kingdom of Saudi Arabia. The company operates through Hospitality, Property management, Property rental, and others segments. It is also involved in construction, acquisition, operation, management, and rental of hotels, restaurants, motels, rest stops, entertainment centers, travel agencies, private and public roads, and tourism related activities. In addition, the company engages in acquisition, development and sale of lands and buildings, as well as offers services to pilgrims and visitors of the Prophet's Mosque. Further, it is involved in renting of land related business. Dur Hospitality Company was incorporated in 1976 and is based in Riyadh, the Kingdom of Saudi Arabia.

1.Name: Mr. Amin Bin Abdullah Al Bukhari
1.Title: Chief Financial Officer
